reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Enter 'DART' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'DART' to appear in the list.
Enter 'Doubleclick for Publishers' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Doubleclick for Publishers' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Doubleclick for Publishers' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'DFP Ad Tags' menu link.
Click the 'Global DFP Settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'DFP Ad Tags dialog'.
Enter 'nbcu' in the 'Network ID' text box.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'DFP Ad Tags' menu link.
Click the 'Add' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Add a new DFP ad dialog'.
Enter '1ec3f822eebf4f8' in the 'Ad Slot Name' text box.
Enter '300x250' in the 'Ad Sizes' text box.
Enter 'Test_AdUnit_Pattern' in the 'Ad Unit Pattern' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of '1ec3f822eebf4f8 has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Blocks' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Blocks dialog'.
Select the block name 'DFP tag: 1ec3f822eebf4f8' from the 'Sidebar first' drop down list.
Click the 'Save Blocks' button.
Verify success message of 'The block settings have been updated.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Assert that the selected block '1ec3f822eebf4f8' contains the 'Sidebar first' text.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Assert the page source contains the 'http://www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js'.
Assert the home page block '1ec3f822eebf4f8' is present.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Blocks' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Blocks dialog'.
Select the block name 'DFP tag: 1ec3f822eebf4f8' from the '- None -' drop down list.
Click the 'Save Blocks' button.
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.

Enter '300x250' in the 'Ad Sizes' text box.
Enter 'Test_AdUnit_Pattern' in the 'Ad Unit Pattern' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of '1ec3f822eebf4f8 has been created.' is present.

Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Blocks' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Blocks dialog'.
Select the block name 'DFP tag: 1ec3f822eebf4f8' from the 'Sidebar first' drop down list.
Click the 'Save Blocks' button.

Assert that the selected block '1ec3f822eebf4f8' contains the 'Sidebar first' text.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Assert the page source contains the 'http://www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js'.
Assert the home page block '1ec3f822eebf4f8' is present.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Blocks' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Blocks dialog'.
Select the block name 'DFP tag: 1ec3f822eebf4f8' from the '- None -' drop down list.
Click the 'Save Blocks' button.
